---
title: "Creating EML Metadata"
editor: visual
---

EML metadata can either be made as a separate file and uploaded to the IPT, or it can be made by filling out the IPT's metadata section. In our case, we used the IPT's built-in metadata section. GBIF's IPT guides you through various categories and required fields, providing descriptions as needed. For this, use metadata provided by the researchers when possible.
